feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for task rounding (down) by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9631

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.4...v5.9.5

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improved query efficiency in the Client Portal
  • PayPal Advanced credit cards
  • Add Nordigen filters
  • Add Nordigen account id to transformer
  • Fixes for line breaks in email text body
  • Fixes for rounding tasks down
  • Fixes for Expense excport preview props
  • Rerun Timezone migrations
  • Add twig linter
  • BTCPay updates
  • Add current company route
  • Migrate statics into singletons (instead of cache)
  • v5.9.6 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9640

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.5...v5.9.6

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update intended path when redirecting to CP. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9642
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9646
  • Static Analysis + Cache refactor by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9648
  • v5.9.7 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.6...v5.9.7
